title: ARAM wins not counting towards ACT 1
body: I have won multiple ARAM games (including a couple last night) and the event of ACT 1 has not updated to reflect my results.  I would like to get started on the second half of ACT 1.

replies.body:
Hey JediofChrist~

Looking at your account, it seems to indicate that you have not actually "started" the path for Act I. 

Did you choose between the Graves and Twisted Fate icon? (a screenshot would be really helpful, if possible!)

Sorry if it seems weird to request this info, just want to rule it out :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Stephiroth,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=hU5ekIi2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-28T17:35:57.959+0000)
>
> Hey JediofChrist~
> 
> Looking at your account, it seems to indicate that you have not actually "started" the path for Act I. 
> 
> Did you choose between the Graves and Twisted Fate icon? (a screenshot would be really helpful, if possible!)
> 
> Sorry if it seems weird to request this info, just want to rule it out :)

what is this "act 1" and how do we "start" it?

All of the quests are divided into Acts.

The first set of objectives, is Act I. You start it by choosing your path, either the Graves icon or the Twisted Fate icon. 

The current Acts released are Act I and Act II. When you finish the objectives in Act I, you are able to hit "Continue" and begin Act II, where you then choose again between Graves and Twisted Fate. 

Here is a handy Player Support page that can walk you in detail through how to earn the icons! https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204981914-Bilgewater-Event-Guide#h3

Yup! I copied you T__T

It was really helpful! <3

I appreciate you posting it, because I didn't think to. But now when people see this issue in the RedTracker, they will see the link and follow it and it may end up helping more people. :)
fair enough...my name isn't in red

UPDATE:  I just played an ARAM and it counted towards ACT 1.  Idk why it worked but thank you @Riot Stephiroth for your response!

yep.  I chose the graves one and hit "ok" or "confirm" or whatever it says.  I actually "started" ACT 1 three times now, each time i logged in.

the picture shows that I have definitely "started" the path.

in fact, I believe I had started path 1 before my fizz game on the evening of 7/27/15

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1900788148/50780744?tab=overview

I hope this helps.  

I am following the link you posted below right after this.

edit:
also. I play on a mac if that makes a difference.

in the bottom left of the landing page click to choose your path.  Then choose either graves or tf.

try [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204981914-Bilgewater-Event-Guide)
